did.abstract: Thirteen employees of the Santa Fe Railroad and the railroad obtained an injunction restraining the unions from striking to secure a union shop contract. The collection consists of company documents as the case moved through various courts as listed below.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Thirteen employees of the Santa Fe Railroad and the railroad obtained an injunction restraining the unions from striking to secure a union shop contract.
The collection consists of company documents as the case moved through various courts.
